tasks.task: List 3 things that make you happy.
List 3 nice things someone has done for you lately.
List 3 nice things you can do for someone else today.
List 3 of the best choices you have made in your day so far.
List 3 notable things about your day.
List 3 ways your emotions have been affecting your behavior.
List 3 qualities you love about your best friend.
List 3 songs that you listened to today.
List 3 things you feel you could be more appreciative of.
List 3 things you feel you’re good at.
List 3 things you people who have impacted your life.
List 3 ways you will bring mindfulness to your day today.
List 3 small things you can do to make your day enjoyable today.
List 3 things you would like to accomplish in the next 5 years.
List 3 people you haven’t talked to in a while.
Try and bring an awareness to your body. List 3 things you noticed.
